author: Nintendo of America
description:
The love letter to survival horror fans is here! Cronos: The New Dawn is available now on Nintendo Switch 2: https://ninten.do/6058s5Qes 

Play now and experience thrilling combat scenarios, tense exploration, and face ever-evolving enemies—all within a twisted time-travel story! 
 
#NintendoSwitch2 #CronosNewDawn #BlooberTeam
title: Cronos: The New Dawn – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Suit up for an epic sci-fi adventure! Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion is out now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch. https://ninten.do/6054s5qdm 
  
Customize your perfect Arsenal and experiment with alien abilities to grow stronger. Explore a deadly and dangerous world alone or with friends, looting resources and rewards from battle to give you an edge in your fight against the oppressive Sovereign Axiom. The battle for humanity's freedom starts today! 
    
#DaemonXMachina #TitanicScion #NintendoSwitch2
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
NBA 2K26 is now available on Nintendo Switch 2! https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/nba-2k26-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 

Bragging rights are on the line in NBA 2K26. Showcase your bag of moves with enhanced gameplay and challenge your friends, or rivals, in NBA 2K26’s competitive modes—and leave no doubt that you wear the crown. 
  
#NintendoSwitch2 #NBA2K26 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: NBA 2K26 – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
